error.invalid_url_schema_override_mqtt_url:
Invalid MQTT URL scheme.
The URL should start with `mqtt://` or `mqtts://`.
error.invalid_url_schema_override_rest_url:
Invalid REST URL scheme.
The URL should start with `http://` or `https://`.

data_description.override_mqtt_url: Enter the MQTT URL of your self-hosted instance including the scheme (mqtt/mqtts).
data_description.override_rest_url: Enter the REST URL of your self-hosted instance including the scheme (http/https).

data_description.continent: Your two-letter continent code (na, eu, etc)
data_description.country: Your two-letter country code (us, uk, etc)
data_description.mode:
Select the mode you want to use to connect to Ecovacs. If you are unsure, select **Cloud**.

Select **Self-hosted** only if you have a working self-hosted instance.

vacuum_raw_get_positions_not_supported.message: Getting the positions of the chargers and the device itself is not supported

vacuum_send_command_params_dict.message: Params must be a dictionary and not a list

vacuum_send_command_params_required.message: Params are required for the command: {command}

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring Ecovacs using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Please verify that you have a stable internet connection and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Ecovacs YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The Ecovacs YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_continent_n.description:
Configuring Ecovacs using YAML is being removed but there is an unexpected continent specified in the YAML configuration.

From the given country, the continent "{continent}" is expected. Change the continent and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Ecovacs YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.

If the contintent "{continent}" is not applicable, please open an issue on [GitHub]({github_issue_url}).
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_continent_n.title: The Ecovacs YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description:
Configuring Ecovacs using YAML is being removed but there was an authentication error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Correct the YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Ecovacs YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: The Ecovacs YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_con.description:
Configuring Ecovacs using YAML is being removed but there is an invalid continent specified in the YAML configuration.

Please correct the continent to be one of {continent_list} and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Ecovacs YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_con.title: The Ecovacs YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_cou.description:
Configuring Ecovacs using YAML is being removed but there is an invalid country specified in the YAML configuration.

Please change the country to the [Alpha-2 code of your country]({countries_url}) and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Ecovacs YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_cou.title: The Ecovacs YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring Ecovacs using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Ensure the YAML configuration is correct and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Ecovacs YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: The Ecovacs YAML configuration import failed

raw_get_positions.description: Get the raw response for the positions of the chargers and the device itself.
raw_get_positions.name: Get raw positions
